content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0) and Burner Inserter at position (1.5, -0.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (3.0, 1.0) and Burner Inserter at position (3.5, -0.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (4.5, 1.5) and Burner Inserter at position (5.5, 1.5) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (6.5, 1.5)

### Belt System
- BeltGroup with inputs at positions (x=-12.5, y=-50.5) and (x=-11.5, y=-49.5), outputs at positions (x=-11.5, y=-52.5) and (x=-13.5, y=-52.5)
- BeltGroup with inputs at position (x=-11.5, y=-50.5), outputs at position (x=-13.5, y=-50.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting belts directly to furnaces
- Ensure to use an inserter to connect belts to a furnace. Belts cannot be directly connected to a Stone Furnace.

### Errors when placing inserters
- Avoid placing an inserter at a position already occupied by another inserter. Consider adjusting the spacing, changing the direction, or selecting a different reference position.
